channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Behold the Manifold, the Concept that Changed How Mathematicians View Space
item.description: In the mid-19th century, Bernhard Riemann conceived of a new way to think about mathematical spaces, providing the foundation for modern geometry and physics.

item.title: How to watch Royal Institution Christmas Lectures 2025 — stream Dr Maggie Aderin-Pocock's trilogy free from anywhere
item.description: A series of three space-themed seminars delivered by Dr Maggie Aderin-Pocock, here's how to watch Royal Institution Christmas Lectures 2025.

item.title: "Post-quantum encryption is not the end" – NordVPN aims for world-first security milestones in 2026
item.description: After adding post-quantum encryption (PQE) to all its apps in May, NordVPN now strives for cryptographic agility. Here's why it matters.

item.title: Voici un petit forfait 4G pas cher pour cette fin d’année : les 15 Go coûtent moins de 4 € /mois
item.description: Il y a les gros consommateurs de données 4G, et les économes qui n'ont pas besoin de 200 Go tous les mois. À ces derniers, Auchan Télécom propose actuellement un forfait mobile 4G de 15 Go à 3,99 euros par mois seulement.

item.title: Therabody Promo Codes and Deals: Get 30% Off This Month
item.description: Save on the science-backed devices you’ve been eyeing with 15% off Theragun discount code and 30% off other great deals.

item.title: Hungryroot Coupon Codes: 30% Off This Month
item.description: Get up to 30% off your first order and free gifts using a Hungryroot promo code today. Discover our best coupons and discounts to let you save on your healthy groceries as a new or returning customer.

item.title: I asked Norton VPN experts for tips on staying safe over Christmas — here's what they said
item.description: The festive season is rife with risks, so I asked the experts everything you need to know
